Equilynx.name: Equilynx
Equilynx.description:
<c=254d0c>Equilynx</c>
From Elestria, it brings the power of the Earth element with it specializing in <c=boldPink>Midrow that want to be Destroyed</c> and <c=boldPink>instant Midrow movement.</c>

BookOfTails.name: BOOK OF TAILS
BookOfTails.description: At start of turn, add a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Fox Tale</c> to your hand.

Counting.name: COUNTING
Counting.description: At start of turn, count sheeps. Once you counted 7 sheep, gain 1 <c=status>ENERGY</c> and start counting again.

FoloiForest.name: FOLOI FOREST
FoloiForest.description: The second time you launch an <c=midrow>object</c> each turn gain <c=boldPink>1</c> <c=status>Overdrive Next Turn</c>

PoisonTippedArrow.name: POISON TIPPED ARROW
PoisonTippedArrow.description: At the start of combat gain <boldPink>1</c> <c=status>Weaken Charge</c>

PoisonedTunic.name: POISONED TUNIC
PoisonedTunic.description: Enemies take <c=boldPink>1</c> extra damage when hit in a <c=parttrait>weak</c> or <c=parttrait>brittle</c> part.

Teratlas.name: TERATLAS
Teratlas.description: At start of turn gain 1 <c=energy>ENERGY</c> if any <c=midrow>object</c> is an <c=midrow>Earth Stone</c> or a <c=midrow>Flower Stone</c>

description.None: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=254d0c>Equilynx</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=254d0c>Equilynx</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=254d0c>Equilynx</c> cards to your hand.

description.None: Attack for set amount = 3. On hit, apply 1 <c=status>BOOST</c>.
description.A: Attack for set amount = 4. On hit, apply 1 <c=status>BOOST</c>.
description.B: Attack for set amount = 5. On hit, apply 2 <c=status>BOOST</c>.

AutododgeLeftNextTurn.name: Autododge Left Next Turn
AutododgeLeftNextTurn.description: At the start of next turn, gain <c=boldPink>{0}</c> <c=status>AUTODODGE LEFT</c>.

EarthStoneDeposit.name: Earth Stone Deposit
EarthStoneDeposit.description: Launch <c=boldPink>{0}</c> <c=midrow>Mini Earth Stones</c> at the start of every turn.

FlowerStoneDeposit.name: Flower Stone Deposit
FlowerStoneDeposit.description: Launch <c=boldPink>{0}</c> <c=midrow>Flower Stones</c> at the start of every turn.

OverdriveNextTurn.name: Overdrive Next Turn
OverdriveNextTurn.description: At the start of next turn, gain <c=boldPink>{0}</c> <c=status>OVERDRIVE</c>.

Mini.name: Mini Earth Stone
Mini.description: When destroyed this attacks for <c=boldPink>1</c> in the same direction.

Normal.name: Earth Stone
Normal.description: When destroyed this attacks for <c=boldPink>2</c> in the same direction.

Big.name: Big Earth Stone
Big.description: When destroyed this attacks for <c=boldPink>3</c> in the same direction.

offset.description: Destroy an <c=midrow>object</c> <c=boldPink>{0}</c> spaces to the {1} of your {2}.

notOffset.description: Destroy an <c=midrow>object</c> in front of your {2}.

DroneMoveRandom.name: Move Midrow Randomly
DroneMoveRandom.description: Instantly move all <c=midrow>midrow objects</c> {0} spaces in a random direction.

m&k: This card has four separate sets of actions.
In combat, <c=keyword>right click or ctrl-click</c> this card to switch between them.
controller: This card has four separate sets of actions.
In combat, press {{Button}} on this card to switch between them.
